description: Advertisement Consent for 25 Banners Mounted on Lamp Post displaying the logo of the Woodberry Down development, the logo of Berkeley Homes, the logo of HackneyCouncil, the logo of Manor House Development Trust and the logo of Woodberry Down Community Organisation along Woodberry Grove,Woodberry Down, New River Path, Swan Ln and within the amenity space serving The Parkhouse. (Retrospective).
decision_conditions: <p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;text-align: justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:10pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial,sans-serif;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:700;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">Standard Advertisement Cond 1</span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;text-align: justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:10pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial,sans-serif;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">No advertisement is to be displayed without the permission of the owner of the site or any other person with an interest in the site entitled to grant permission.&nbsp;</span></p><p><span id="docs-internal-guid-fe73d1bd-7fff-383c-aab5-7225204b65f3"></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;text-align: justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:10pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial,sans-serif;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">Reason: To comply with the Town and Country Planning (Control of Advertisements) (England) Regulations 2007</span></p>

<p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;text-align: justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:10pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial,sans-serif;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:700;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">Standard Advertisement Cond 2</span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;text-align: justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:10pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial,sans-serif;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">No advertisement shall be sited or displayed so as to -&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;text-align: justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:10pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial,sans-serif;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">(a) endanger persons using any highway, railway, waterway, dock, harbour or aerodrome (civil or military);&nbsp;</span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;text-align: justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:10pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial,sans-serif;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">(b) obscure, or hinder the ready interpretation of, any traffic sign, railway&nbsp; signal or aid to navigation by water or air;&nbsp;</span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;text-align: justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:10pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial,sans-serif;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">(c)or hinder the operation of any device used for the purpose of security or surveillance or for measuring the speed of any vehicle.&nbsp;</span></p><p><span id="docs-internal-guid-6bd10a78-7fff-9b12-186a-a0a3b8ab41e4"></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;text-align: justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:10pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial,sans-serif;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">Reason: To comply with the Town and Country Planning (Control of Advertisements) (England) Regulations 2007</span></p>

<p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;text-align: justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:10pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial,sans-serif;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:700;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">Standard Advertisement Cond 3</span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;text-align: justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:10pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial,sans-serif;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">Any advertisement displayed, and any site used for the display of advertisements, shall be maintained in a condition that does not impair the visual amenity of the site.&nbsp;</span></p><p><span id="docs-internal-guid-562b6420-7fff-0db5-1faf-3b09c30676d8"></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;text-align: justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:10pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial,sans-serif;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">Reason: To comply with the Town and Country Planning (Control of Advertisements) (England) Regulations 2007</span></p>

<p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;text-align: justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:10pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial,sans-serif;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:700;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">Standard Advertisement Cond 4</span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;text-align: justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:10pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial,sans-serif;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">Any structure or hoarding erected or used for the display of advertisements shall be maintained in a condition that does not endanger the public.&nbsp;</span></p><p><span id="docs-internal-guid-0acf6df5-7fff-34a2-0bf2-6717f70e6383"></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial,sans-serif;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">Reason: To comply with the Town and Country Planning (Control of Advertisements) (England) Regulations 2007</span></p>

<p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;text-align: justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:10pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial,sans-serif;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:700;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">Standard Advertisement Cond 5</span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial,sans-serif;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">Where an advertisement is required under these Regulations to be removed, the site shall be left in a condition that does not endanger the public or impair visual amenity.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></p><p><span id="docs-internal-guid-153fc31e-7fff-b875-23f6-cfc4a0e544c6"><br></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial,sans-serif;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">Reason: To comply with the Town and Country Planning (Control of Advertisements) (England) Regulations 2007</span></p>

<p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;text-align: justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:10pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial,sans-serif;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:700;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">Approved Plans</span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;text-align: justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:10pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial,sans-serif;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in complete accordance with the approved plans:&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></p><p><span id="docs-internal-guid-2cc362d6-7fff-241f-26c7-4d91473be8c5"></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;text-align: justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:10pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial,sans-serif;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.</span></p>

<p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;text-align: justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:10pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial,sans-serif;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:700;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">Time Limit for Removal.&nbsp;</span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;text-align: justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:10pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial,sans-serif;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">The advertisements hereby approved shall be removed after 5 years of the date of this notice.&nbsp;</span></p><p><span id="docs-internal-guid-7651cc58-7fff-8288-f605-0b2a5f1cdd0a"></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;text-align: justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:10pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial,sans-serif;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">Reason: To ensure that the character of the area is protected once the development is completed.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></p>
